                  by = "subject",
                  keep = FALSE
                ) %>%
    pivot_longer(cols =c(VAS, wtp) , 
                 names_to = "measure", 
                 values_to = "rating") %>%
    inner_join(., data_q,
             by = "subject", 
             keep = FALSE)%>%
  filter(-is.na(rating))
